title: Prego Pizza
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Israeli, Kosher, Non-veg
description: Serves fish, veg options available. Pizzeria, offers vegan pizza made with vegan cheese and other choices including Yemenite ziva, a dough filled with vegan cheese and mushrooms and olives. There's also a selection of salads and Yemenite dishes that come with an egg that you can request without.
